TaskDescription: The piston on the pillar represents machine, that does some work on the piece beneath it. This could be a drill, laser, packaking machine... Use TP timer (Why?) and activate it for 5 seconds, when the SwitchMachine is pressed. When output is true stop table movement and link ButtonBlackRightDown with ValveMachine. This will enable manual control over the machine for specified period. When developing, you dont need to restart the scene when testing your program. Use force table to trigger SwitchMachine anytime! Start testing, when table start rotating. When workpiece is beneath the piston, pres and hold it for the purpose of test.
